report.title: NBN Exchange format using standard filters
report.description: An extract of records in a format suitable for creating NBN Exchange format files in combination with the nbn output format. Compatible with the standard report filter parameters.
report.query: select #columns# FROM cache_occurrences_functional o JOIN cache_occurrences_nonfunctional onf on onf.id=o.id JOIN cache_samples_nonfunctional snf on snf.id=o.sample_id JOIN cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl on cttl.id=o.taxa_taxon_list_id LEFT JOIN locations vc on vc.id=o.location_id_vice_county and vc.deleted=false LEFT JOIN group_relations grel on grel.to_group_id=o.group_id and grel.deleted=false LEFT JOIN groups g2 on g2.id=grel.from_group_id and g2.deleted=false #agreements_join# #joins# where #sharing_filter# and o.date_type in ('D','DD','O','OO','Y','YY','-Y','U') and (snf.entered_sref_system ilike 'osgb' or snf.entered_sref_system ilike 'osie' or snf.entered_sref_system = '4326' or snf.entered_sref_system = '27700') and o.taxa_taxon_list_external_key is not null and st_x(st_transform(st_centroid(o.public_geom), 4326)) between -14 and 13 and st_y(st_transform(st_centroid(o.public_geom), 4326)) between 48 and 62 #idlist#

param.name: smpattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of sample attribute IDs to include

param.name: occattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of occurrence attribute IDs to include

column.name: sensitive
column.sql: case when onf.sensitivity_precision is null then 'F' else 'T' end

column.name: gridreference
column.sql: case when snf.entered_sref_system in ('4326', '27700') then null else replace(snf.public_entered_sref, ' ', '') end

column.name: east
column.sql: case when snf.entered_sref_system in ('4326', '27700') then st_x(st_transform(st_centroid(o.public_geom), snf.entered_sref_system::int)) else null end

column.name: north
column.sql: case when snf.entered_sref_system in ('4326', '27700') then st_y(st_transform(st_centroid(o.public_geom), snf.entered_sref_system::int)) else null end

column.name: projection
column.sql: case upper(snf.entered_sref_system) when '4326' then 'WGS84' when '27700' then 'OSGB36' when 'OSIE' then 'OSI' else upper(snf.entered_sref_system) end

column.name: precision
column.sql: case snf.entered_sref_system when '4326' then 50 when '27700' then 1 else case length(replace(snf.public_entered_sref, ' ', '')) when 5 then 2000 else pow(10, (12-length(replace(snf.public_entered_sref, ' ', '')))/2) end end

column.name: associated_with
column.sql: (select string_agg(case when cttlassoc.default_common_name is null then cttlassoc.preferred_taxon else cttlassoc.default_common_name || ' (' || cttlassoc.preferred_taxon || ')' end, ', ') from occurrence_associations oa join cache_occurrences_functional oassoc on oassoc.id=oa.to_occurrence_id join cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttlassoc on cttlassoc.id=oassoc.taxa_taxon_list_id where oa.from_occurrence_id=o.id )

column.name: association_detail
column.sql: (select string_agg( case when oa.from_occurrence_id=o.id then case when cttl.default_common_name is null then cttl.preferred_taxon else cttl.default_common_name || ' (' || cttl.preferred_taxon || ')' end else case when cttlassoc.default_common_name is null then cttlassoc.preferred_taxon else cttlassoc.default_common_name || ' (' || cttlassoc.preferred_taxon || ')' end end || ' ' || assoctype.term || ' ' || case when oa.to_occurrence_id=o.id then case when cttl.default_common_name is null then cttl.preferred_taxon else cttl.default_common_name || ' (' || cttl.preferred_taxon || ')' end else case when cttlassoc.default_common_name is null then cttlassoc.preferred_taxon else cttlassoc.default_common_name || ' (' || cttlassoc.preferred_taxon || ')' end end || coalesce(' ' || assocpos.term, '') || coalesce(' ' || assocpart.term, '') || coalesce(' resulting in ' || associmpact.term, ''), ', ') from occurrence_associations oa join cache_occurrences_functional oassoc on oassoc.id=oa.to_occurrence_id join cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttlassoc on cttlassoc.id=oassoc.taxa_taxon_list_id JOIN cache_termlists_terms assoctype on assoctype.id=oa.association_type_id LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms assocpart on assocpart.id=oa.part_id LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms assocpos on assocpos.id=oa.position_id LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms associmpact on associmpact.id=oa.impact_id where oa.from_occurrence_id=o.id )
